subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: J. P. Dumont scored an unassisted short-handed goal, then added a power-play goal 2 minutes 30 seconds later in the Predators’ 5-2 victory that tied their Western Conference quarterfinal.
snippet: J. P. Dumont scored an unassisted short-handed goal, then added a power-play goal 2 minutes 30 seconds later in the Predators’ 5-2 victory that tied their Western Conference quarterfinal.
